bug.author: tamuhey
bug.description:
spaCy/spacy/pipeline/pipes.pyx
Line 70 in 8ebc371
if isinstance(predictions, tuple) and len(tuple) == 2:
len(tuple) == 2 in the line will raise error. I think len(predictions) is valid.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tamuhey>@tamuhey</denchmark-link> , nice catch, and thanks for submitting the corresponding pull request!
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
